item.title: [voc] Midnight Clock
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {U}.

{2}{U}: Put an hour counter on Midnight Clock.

At the beginning of each upkeep, put an hour counter on Midnight Clock.

When the twelfth hour counter is put on Midnight Clock, shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw seven cards. Exile Midnight Clock.

item.title: [voc] Midnight Arsonist
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

When Midnight Arsonist enters the battlefield, destroy up to X target artifacts without mana abilities, where X is the number of Vampires you control.

item.title: [voc] Myriad Landscape
item.description:
Land

Myriad Landscape enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {C}.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Myriad Landscape: Search your library for up to two basic land cards that share a land type, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [voc] Moorland Haunt
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{W}{U}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

item.title: [voc] Molten Echoes
item.description:
Enchantment

As Molten Echoes enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

Whenever a nontoken creature of the chosen type enters the battlefield under your control, create a token that's a copy of that creature. That token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [voc] Mob Rule
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Gain control of all creatures with power 4 or greater until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.

• Gain control of all creatures with power 3 or less until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.

item.title: [voc] Night's Whisper
item.description:
Sorcery

You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

item.title: [voc] Necropolis Regent
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Flying

Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put that many +1/+1 counters on it.

item.title: [voc] Nebelgast Herald
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Flying

Whenever Nebelgast Herald or another Spirit enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

item.title: [voc] Occult Epiphany
item.description:
Instant

Draw X cards, then discard X cards. Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying for each card type among cards discarded this way.

item.title: [voc] Nirkana Revenant
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Shade

Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add an additional {B}.

{B}: Nirkana Revenant gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [voc] Occult Epiphany
item.description:
Instant

Draw X cards, then discard X cards. Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying for each card type among cards discarded this way.

item.title: [voc] Path of Ancestry
item.description:
Land

Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.title: [voc] Oyobi, Who Split the Heavens
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit

Flying

Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, create a 3/3 white Spirit creature token with flying.

item.title: [voc] Olivia's Wrath
item.description:
Sorcery

Each non-Vampire creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Vampires you control.

item.title: [voc] Prairie Stream
item.description:
Land — Plains Island

({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)

Prairie Stream enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

item.title: [voc] Port Town
item.description:
Land

As Port Town enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Plains or Island card from your hand. If you don't, Port Town enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

item.title: [voc] Patron of the Vein
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Shaman

Flying

When Patron of the Vein enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls.

Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, exile it and put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

item.title: [voc] Predators' Hour
item.description:
21

Until end of turn, creatures you control gain menace and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library face down. You may look at and play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell."

item.title: [voc] Predators' Hour
item.description:
21

Until end of turn, creatures you control gain menace and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library face down. You may look at and play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell."

item.title: [voc] Priest of the Blessed Graf
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

At the beginning of your end step, create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of opponents who control more lands than you.

item.title: [voc] Rakdos Carnarium
item.description:
Land

Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield tapped.

When Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.

{T}: Add {B}{R}.

item.title: [voc] Promise of Bunrei
item.description:
Enchantment

When a creature you control dies, sacrifice Promise of Bunrei. If you do, create four 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens.

item.title: [voc] Priest of the Blessed Graf
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

At the beginning of your end step, create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of opponents who control more lands than you.

item.title: [voc] Remorseful Cleric
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Cleric

Flying

Sacrifice Remorseful Cleric: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

item.title: [voc] Reconnaissance Mission
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.title: [voc] Rattlechains
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flash

Flying

When Rattlechains enters the battlefield, target Spirit gains hexproof until end of turn.

You may cast Spirit spells as though they had flash.

item.title: [voc] Rakish Heir
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Whenever a Vampire you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [voc] Rakdos Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Add {B}{R}.

item.title: [voc] Rakdos Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

• Destroy target artifact.

• Each creature deals 1 damage to its controller.

item.title: [voc] Rhoda, Geist Avenger
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Soldier

Partner with Timin, Youthful Geist (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Timin into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)

Vigilance

Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, put a +1/+1 counter on Rhoda, Geist Avenger.

item.title: [voc] Rhoda, Geist Avenger
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Soldier

Partner with Timin, Youthful Geist (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Timin into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)

Vigilance

Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, put a +1/+1 counter on Rhoda, Geist Avenger.

item.title: [voc] Scion of Opulence
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Noble

Whenever Scion of Opulence or another nontoken Vampire you control dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

{R}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

item.title: [voc] Sanctum Seeker
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Knight

Whenever a Vampire you control attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

item.title: [voc] Shadowblood Ridge
item.description:
Land

{1}, {T}: Add {B}{R}.

item.title: [voc] Shacklegeist
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

Shacklegeist can block only creatures with flying.

Tap two untapped Spirits you control: Tap target creature you don't control.

item.title: [voc] Scion of Opulence
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Noble

Whenever Scion of Opulence or another nontoken Vampire you control dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

{R}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

item.title: [voc] Shadowgrange Archfiend
item.description:
Creature — Demon

When Shadowgrange Archfiend enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures they control. You gain life equal to the greatest power among creatures sacrificed this way.

Madness—{2}{B}, Pay 8 life. (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [voc] Shadowgrange Archfiend
item.description:
Creature — Demon

When Shadowgrange Archfiend enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures they control. You gain life equal to the greatest power among creatures sacrificed this way.

Madness—{2}{B}, Pay 8 life. (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [voc] Olivia's Wrath
item.description:
Sorcery

Each non-Vampire creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Vampires you control.

item.title: [pl21] Tahngarth, First Mate
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Minotaur Warrior

Tahngarth, First Mate can't be blocked by more than one creature.

Whenever an opponent attacks with one or more creatures, if Tahngarth is tapped, you may have that opponent gain control of Tahngarth until end of combat. If you do, choose a player or planeswalker that opponent is attacking. Tahngarth is attacking that player or planeswalker.

item.title: [pl21] Angrath, the Flame-Chained
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Angrath

+1: Each opponent discards a card and loses 2 life.

−3: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step if it has mana value 3 or less.

−8: Each opponent loses life equal to the number of cards in their graveyard.

item.title: [vow] Kaya, Geist Hunter
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Kaya

+1: Creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature token you control.

−2: Until end of turn, if one or more tokens would be created under your control, twice that many of those tokens are created instead.

−6: Exile all cards from all graveyards, then create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying for each card exiled this way.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/innistrad-crimson-vow-variants

item.title: [vow] Dreamshackle Geist
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose up to one —

• Tap target creature.

• Target creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

item.title: [vow] Creepy Puppeteer
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

Haste

Whenever Creepy Puppeteer attacks, if you attacked with exactly one other creature this combat, you may have that creature's base power and toughness become 4/3 until end of turn.

item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Menace

When Bloodcrazed Socialite enters the battlefield, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

Whenever Bloodcrazed Socialite attacks, you may sacrifice a Blood token. If you do, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
